page.title: 11LIFESTYLE & SOCIAL CONCERN
page.content: Lifestyle in the 3 villages is mostly ordered family units-fairly slow pace. Many villagers known to each other.The new village hall in Broadmayne since 1982 replacing poorly positioned, delapidated one,now demolished.Site debated at length but playing fields decided.Estimated cost Â£117,000. Villagers raised Â£27,000 already. Parish,District & County Council grants to come-building to start 1986. Social concern:mixed social & economic classes-little real poverty or real wealth. Age concerns expressed from Toddlers group to Darby & Joan club.Meals on Wheels cooked & delivered by villagers.
